rows.label: qst200411_msg0001
rows.name:
Bits and pieces... After talking to
the townsfolk, here's what we know.

rows.label: qst200411_msg0002
rows.name:
Pretend-injured blackmailer people
and doctor name Celian are work
together.

rows.label: qst200411_msg0003
rows.name:
Also, the doctor has some secret ties
to the moneylender, Arreth...

rows.label: qst200411_msg0004
rows.name:
We also heard rumors that the medical
fees he charges are astronomical.

rows.label: qst200411_msg0005
rows.name:
Further, the doctor and the lender meet
at night in the Old City of Teddim...

rows.label: qst200411_msg0006
rows.name:
That mean doctor and loan shark
working together!

rows.label: qst200411_msg0016
rows.name: It sure sounds like I've been had...

rows.label: qst200411_msg0007
rows.name:
But all that's not enough proof
to get them arrested. Not yet.

rows.label: qst200411_msg0009
rows.name:
We shall visit the old town at night
and witness them in the act.

rows.label: qst200411_msg0010
rows.name:
Evidence thus obtained,
we may then judge them fairly.

rows.label: qst200411_msg0011
rows.name: Hm, yeah, that'd be the quickest way...

rows.label: qst200411_msg0012
rows.name: Not sure will go so smooth...

rows.label: qst200411_msg0013
rows.name:
We can argue here till the Armu come
home, and we'll make no progress.

rows.label: qst200411_msg0014
rows.name:
Let's do as Vasara says.
Let's visit the Old City of Teddim
at night!

rows.label: qst200411_msg0017
rows.name:
It's bound to be dangerous, though.
Ellenora, you should stay home.
